mosinstall.name: Google Site Map
mosinstall.author: Chef Groovy
mosinstall.description: Creates a sitemap for use in Google webmaster tools. Leave off gallery ID to list all files in database. To call it, use URL http://WWW.MYSITE.COM/index.php?option=com_rsgallery2&task=xml&xmlTemplate=xml_google_sitemap&gid=17

param.name: DateFormat
param.label: Format for lastmod element.
param.description: Uses date the file was uploaded. Use Y-m-d\TH:i:s\Z to show date and time.
